name: Phantom Pilgrimage
description:
Within the inner depths of purgatory, help a fallen soul through ethereal and perilous obstacles to uncover their past. Overcome personal demons to forgive the cost of heroism and reclaim their humanity.

Phantom Pilgrimage is a 2D single-player platformer game. Trek through desperate times to complete a soul's story.

Controls:

Horizontal movement: ‘A’ or ‘D’ keys 

Jump: ‘W’ key (1 time)

Double Jump: ‘W’ key (2 times)

Dash: Spacebar

Use DASH to attack enemies and go through obstacles!

Options Menu:  'Esc'  key

Credits

Game Designers: Gavin Scheafer & Noel Alejandro Machuca Paredes

Programmers: Trent Ku, Aditya Bakshi, Jose Dzib, Anastacio Ruiz, Shengjie Zhang & Rithwik Saikrishna Garapati

Writer: Louis Khuat

Artist: Siyun Zheng

UI/UX:Jennifer La

Producers: Emily Chavez & Trent Ku
